<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass prepares a module containing type metadata for ThinLTO by splitting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it into regular and thin LTO parts if possible, and writing both parts to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// written unmodified as a single module.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
